title: Looking for some hombres to climg to lvl 30 and play with
body:
yo,  been playing league for a little while now and getting the hang of it, but i love playing with the same people or just people that are up for using curse voice or something to actually communicate!, i have like 10 years of gaming experience competitive games so i know how to act etc  and just really want to learn more and play with same guys , been playing top/jungle mostly




add me
